Class RegistrationNumber

  • java.lang.Object
    • RegistrationNumber

  • public class RegistrationNumber
extends java.lang.Object
    A class representing a car's Registration Number of the form a0000. A new unique registration number is generated upon calling 'RegistrationNumber.getInstance()'.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static RegistrationNumber getInstance()
      Factory method for returning a new RegistrationNumber instance.
      char getLetter()
      Returns the letter component of the registration number.
      int getNumbers()
      Returns the number portion of the registration number.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a string representation of a full registration number.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static RegistrationNumber getInstance()
        Factory method for returning a new RegistrationNumber instance. increments numbers until max, then resets the number and increments the number. e.g. a9998, a9999, b0000, b0001 ... z9999 -- will return null after z9999.
        Returns:
        A new unique registration number

      • getLetter

        public char getLetter()
        Returns the letter component of the registration number.
        Returns:

      • getNumbers

        public int getNumbers()
        Returns the number portion of the registration number.
        Returns:

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a string representation of a full registration number.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
